articles.author: ANIRUDDHA GHOSAL Associated Press, HARUKA NUGA Associated Press
articles.title: Latest deep-sea search for missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 gets underway - ABC News
articles.description: A deep-sea search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 has begun in the Indian Ocean, reviving efforts to solve one of aviation’s greatest mysteries
articles.content: HANOI, Vietnam -- A deep-sea search for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 began in the Indian Ocean on Wednesday, reviving efforts to solve one of aviations greatest mysteries more than a decade after the… [+2287 chars]
